net.sf.sprockets.content

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.content.Content

  • public class Content
extends Object
    Constants and utility methods for working with ContentResolvers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Content.Query
      Holds parameters that are used in a query.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CALLER_IS_SYNCADAPTER
      URI query parameter to specify that the caller is a sync adapter and the changes it makes do not need to be synced to the network.
      static String GROUP_BY
      URI query parameter for the column(s) to group the rows by.
      static String HAVING
      URI query parameter for the filter to apply after grouping the rows.
      static String LIMIT
      URI query parameter for requesting a limited number of rows returned by the query.
      static String NOTIFY_CHANGE
      URI query parameter to specify if observers should be notified about the change.
      static String SYNC_EXTRAS_DOWNLOAD
      True if data should be downloaded.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getCount(Context context, Uri uri)
      Get the number of rows at the URI.
      static void requestSyncNow(Account account, String authority)
      Request that a sync starts immediately.
      static void requestSyncNow(Account account, String authority, Bundle extras)
      Request that a sync starts immediately.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
